_comment: For more information about the format of this file, see [TODO: make wiki page and put link here]

tasks.name: create_rebroadcasts
tasks.description: On BoxCast, create rebroadcasts titled 'Sunday Gathering Rebroadcast: %{DATE_MDY}%' at 1:00 pm, 5:00 pm, and 7:00 pm.

tasks.name: export_to_vimeo
tasks.description: On BoxCast, export the recording to Vimeo.

tasks.name: get_vimeo_video_data
tasks.description: The Vimeo video data could not be retrieved automatically. See the logs for details.

tasks.name: rename_video_on_vimeo
tasks.description: On Vimeo, rename the video to '%{DATE_YMD}% | %{MESSAGE_SERIES}% | %{MESSAGE_TITLE}%'.

tasks.name: start_generating_captions
tasks.description: On BoxCast, press the button to start generating captions.

tasks.name: review_and_publish_captions
tasks.description: On BoxCast, review low-confidence cues and publish the captions.

tasks.name: download_captions
tasks.description: On BoxCast, download the captions and save them in '%{CAPTIONS_DIR}%\original.vtt'.

tasks.name: review_captions
tasks.description: In %{CAPTIONS_DIR}%\final.vtt, double-check that the worship captions were removed properly (if it was done automatically).

tasks.name: upload_captions_to_vimeo
tasks.description: On Vimeo, upload the captions and make sure they are enabled.
